page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In spite of the industrial area around Winwick Quay and Winwick Hospital, another local source of employment, many people go out of the area to work.There is also a great deal of unemployment in the area especially among the young, and many people both young and older have become disheartened and do not even bother to look for work.The lack of job prospects for school leavers does not seem to have affected children's attitudes to their work, and many children are going back to school after the age of 16 to continue their studies because they have no jobs to go to.Crime in the area is on the increase _petty theft and shoplifting.Schools suffer break_ins from time to time and also vandalism _ broken windows, fences pulled down etc.
